question_content.description:
### Problem01

To learn object-oriented programming(OOP), we need to review the
definition of datatype.
- A data type is a set of _____(0)\___ and a set of _____(1)\___ defind on those values.

- An _____(2)\___ data type is data type whose representation is
  hidden from the client.

- An _____(3)\___ is an entity that holds a data-type value; you can
  manipulate this data-type value by applying one of the _____(4)\___’s data-type operations.
question_content.author: Yantao
